skills.name: VENGEANCE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• Transfers Negative Effects to the enemy.
• Damage increases based on your MAGIC and SPECIAL stats.

skills.name: CHAIN
desc: • Deals high physical damage to an enemy.
• Seals a Skill of the enemy for 4 turns.
• Seals a Skill on caster for 2 turns.

skills.name: PASSIVE AGGRESSION
desc: Inflicts Passive Disable on all enemies on the first turn. 50% Chance to Disable Passives of enemies every subsequent turn. (Does not affect Bosses).
